change_log:
Feature: Added option to move a question on specified page/position
 Feature: Added image answer type support for horizontal multiple response questions
 Feature: Added separate button on first page to start quiz/survey
 Bug: Fixed issue with fill in the blank question type causing conflict with other plugins
 Bug: Fixed question position issue while duplicating questions
 Bug: Fixed issue with %TIMER_MINUTES% variable
 Bug: Fixed security issues
 Enhancement: Improved format of wrong answers in emails

new_addons.name: Advanced Question Types
new_addons.description: The Advanced Questions plugin allows you to include three powerful question types in your Quizzes and Surveys, including radio and checkbox grids and matching pairs questions.

new_addons.name: Pro Bundle
new_addons.description: All QSM Addons in one single and affordable package. Over 34 addons are included in this package and new addons are added automatically. Save over $1600 by buying our bundle.

new_addons.name: Plus Bundle
new_addons.description: 14+ addons to add useful features to your quiz and surveys.

new_addons.name: Basic Bundle
new_addons.description: All the right addons to get you started with QSM premium features.

all_addons.name: Advanced Question Types
all_addons.description: The Advanced Questions plugin allows you to include three powerful question types in your Quizzes and Surveys, including radio and checkbox grids and matching pairs questions.

all_addons.name: ActiveCampaign Integration
all_addons.description: Integrate the Active Campaign service with QSM and create an Email Marketing Campaign using the user data collected.

all_addons.name: Advanced Timer
all_addons.description: Provide a visible timer on the quiz page to track quiz duration and user progress to observe how each question is answered.

all_addons.name: Google Sheet Connector
all_addons.description: This addon automates the process of sending form responses in real time, with responses immediately synced to your selected Google Sheet.

all_addons.name: Paypal and Stripe Payment Integration
all_addons.description: With this addon, create paid quizzes and tests on your website and allow users to pay by credit card or transfer payments using Stripe and PayPal payment processors.

all_addons.name: Save & Resume
all_addons.description: The Save & Resume addon allows you to save and resume unfinished quizzes/exams and allow people to complete the quiz at their convenience.

all_addons.name: reCaptcha
all_addons.description: This addon keep bots and scripts out of the quiz/survey. With a single click, you can add a reCaptcha v2/v3 protection layer to your quiz/survey.

all_addons.name: URL Parameters
all_addons.description: Using URL parameters addon, you may track users as they progress through several funnels. Send data in the form of parameters that can be modified dynamically via a URL.

all_addons.name: Simple Popups
all_addons.description: Display quizzes and surveys as popups Simply install the plugin and you can start creating popups in minutes.

all_addons.name: Flashcards
all_addons.description: Display flashcards for users to share information, learn, and interact with. Simply flip the card, judge, and decide whether it is correct or incorrect based on the question.

all_addons.name: Google Analytics Tracking
all_addons.description: Google Analytics addon helps in tracking quiz and survey submissions and deliver custom events when visitors complete your quizzes and surveys.

all_addons.name: Leaderboards
all_addons.description: Show the quiz participants a 5-level leaderboard to increase their competitiveness. Display a leaderboard with the names of your top five quiz takers.

all_addons.name: Export & Import
all_addons.description: This addon can be used to export and import quizzes and surveys from one website to another. You can quickly export all or partial quizzes as CSV or JSON files and import them into your next website.

all_addons.name: Summary Emails
all_addons.description: Replace the frequent emails concerning individual quiz completions. Receive emails that offer a summary of all the outcomes over the course of a day or a week with the summary emails addons.

all_addons.name: Certificate
all_addons.description: Give out certificates to people who completed the quiz with this addition. And you can make your own personalized certificate by changing the title, content, background image, and logo.

all_addons.name: Logic
all_addons.description: You can use the Logic addon to add logic and conditions to your quizzes and surveys. Displaying questions based on the user’s reaction humanizes your quizzes.

all_addons.name: Drip Integration
all_addons.description: Grow your mailing list with quizzes and surveys, and create user-friendly drip email courses and feature-rich marketing automation

all_addons.name: Landing Page
all_addons.description: Send the user to a simple landing page with just the survey or quiz to guarantee that the form is completed without distraction.

all_addons.name: ConvertKit Integration
all_addons.description: ConvertKit can help you grow your mailing list with quizzes and surveys by establishing straight forward drip email sequences and strong marketing automation.

all_addons.name: Easy Digital Downloads Integration
all_addons.description: With this addon, integrate Quiz And Survey Master with Easy Digital Downloads to sell access to a quiz, exam, or survey.

all_addons.name: Reporting & Analysis
all_addons.description: This plugin enables you to analyze quiz/survey results through the use of various charts and graphs. You can even filter and export the data for further research.

all_addons.name: Get Response Integration
all_addons.description: With this addon, expand your Get Response subscriber list by adding individuals who take your quizzes and surveys!

all_addons.name: Campaign Monitor Integration
all_addons.description: Run Complex Marketing campaigns with Campaign Monitor and expand your subscriber list by adding individuals who attempt your quizzes and surveys!

all_addons.name: Zapier Integration
all_addons.description: By automating your work, this plugin can save you time and help you achieve more powerful results. Connect various services and send your results to over 700 websites.

all_addons.name: Slack Integration
all_addons.description: Get notified on Slack whenever someone takes your quiz/survey. Receive a personalized message to your specified channel with the Slack Integration plugin.

all_addons.name: Gradebook
all_addons.description: Get a gradebook with all of the user’s average points and average scores on quizzes and tests to see what the user has earned and when.

all_addons.name: Daily Limit
all_addons.description: Stop duplicate quizzes/survey attempts by limiting users to a certain number of submissions each day.

all_addons.name: Extra Template Variables
all_addons.description: Get the 5 more template variables and add more quiz and survey data to your emails and results page.

all_addons.name: Aweber Integration
all_addons.description: With this addon, increase your Aweber subscriber list by adding individuals who take your quizzes or surveys!

all_addons.name: Extra Shortcodes
all_addons.description: Extra Shortcodes are used to display more information by leveraging options into the QSM plugin’s default shortcodes.

all_addons.name: Export Results
all_addons.description: This addon enables you to export quiz results as a CSV or PDF file. You can export fields such as correct/incorrect responses, total correct answers, total questions, score, and so on.

all_addons.name: User Dashboard
all_addons.description: Display a personalized dashboard to your users that includes Quiz/Survey information such as the Quiz Name, Score Earned, Time Taken, Time to Complete, and so on.

all_addons.name: MailChimp Integration
all_addons.description: Grow your email list with the MailChimp addon, provide users a checkbox, or automatically add them to your mailing lists. Also, add new tags to your existing subscriber list.

all_addons.name: MailPoet Integration
all_addons.description: Use this add-on to add users who take your quizzes and surveys to your MailPoet subscriber list!

all_addons.name: Advanced Leaderboard
all_addons.description: With this addon, show a quiz leaderboard with graphs and other quiz statistics. Get four new leaderboard shortcodes and two new widgets that you may edit to your liking.

blog_post.title: Build a “How Did You Hear About Us?” Survey in WordPress in 4 Easy Steps!
blog_post.excerpt:
A “How Did You Hear About Us?” survey page can be a good way to set a communication with your users. It helps you to learn how your brand/service/product is being discovered online. Such surveys are not rocket science and can be made easily, even with a few questions. However, a WordPress survey form maker …

Build a “How Did You Hear About Us?” Survey in WordPress in 4 Easy Steps! Read More »

blog_post.title: QSM Themes: Make beautiful Quizzes and Surveys (5 minutes read)
blog_post.excerpt:
QSM themes that the Quiz and Survey Master Plugin has to offer are one of a kind and really stand out for every different genre of various websites. Even so, many a time, we overlook the fact that these themes actually play a very important role whenever we are making any quiz or a survey. …

QSM Themes: Make beautiful Quizzes and Surveys (5 minutes read) Read More »
